sentence.Network_en: She refused to promote Colin above the low rank of "legal adviser".
sentence.Network_cn: 她拒绝把科林由“法律顾问”这一低级别往上提。

sentence.Network_en: If you are in any doubt, consult a financial adviser.
sentence.Network_cn: 如有任何疑问，请向财务顾问咨询。

sentence.Network_en: He was relieved of his duties as presidential adviser.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被撤销了总统顾问一职。

entry.def: An adviser is an expert whose job is to give advice to another person or to a group of people.

example.ex: In Washington, the President and his advisers spent the day in meetings.
example.tran: 在华盛顿，总统和他的顾问们一整天都在开会。

sentences.sentence: "an adviser helped students select their courses"
"the United States sent military advisors to Guatemala"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ric Bailey is the BBC's chief political adviser.

auth_sentence.content: He is the chief climate adviser to our government.

Sentence.sentence: And clever as Mr Obama's advisers are, history suggests they will be bad at this.
The advisers also meet with students privately and stay in touch with parents, so they are deeply invested in the students'uccess
Federation of American Societies for Experimental Biology recommended that every postdoctoral researcher put together an IDP m consultation with an adviser.
An IDP be made in consultation with an adviser

Trying to quantify or measure the impact of women in politics is hard because in very few countries have there been enough women in politics to make a difference,"says Anne-Marie Goetz, peace and security adviser for U.N. Women.

sentences.en: They employed me as an adviser.
Do you have a financial adviser?
We shall have to bring in professional advisers to help us to cost out this job.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不找一些专业顾问来帮助我们估计一下这项工作所需要的费用。

sentences.en: The community adviser gave us a caravan to live in.
sentences.cn: 社区顾问给了我们一间活动住房栖身。

sentences.en: The duke was the king’s most trusted adviser.
sentences.cn: 公爵是国王最信赖的顾问。

sentences.en: After asking many experts for advice,you can become an expert yourself.
